Welcome to Mini-elearning-platform

This is a mega learning point; a platform for learning how to program computers in a variety of programming languages.

Join our platform to have access to a community of people that are always willing to help you with your coding problems.

Learn CSS: This is the platform where you'll learn how to give your website some decent styling.

Learn javascript: this  is the place to go if you want to learn how to make your websites more interactive.
